name: getEncryptionStatus
description: Get the current encryption at rest status of the cluster.

id.description: ID of the Rubrik cluster or *me* for self.

$ul: **cipher**: Cipher method for encryption at rest.

**isEncrypted**: A Boolean value that specifies whether data on the cluster is encrypted at rest. When this value is 'true,' data stored on the cluster is encrypted. When this value is 'false,' data stored on the cluster is not encrypted.
**keyLength**: Key length for encryption at rest.
**keyProtection**: Key protection method for encryption at rest.
